name: 'You and where the coral lies'
description:
'You and Where the coral lies' is a full length kaftan that features an original bold, print. 'Where the coral lies' is made from a soft fabric that is slightly sheer and flowing. This kaftan features thigh high sexy splits on either side. This gorgeous kaftans have been designed with versatility in mind, from luxurious beachwear to trend-setting causal/evening wear. Make a statement when wearing 'You and Where the coral lies'.


Every 'Ginger and You' kaftan has been created with individual signature prints you won't find anywhere else! 

Composition: 100% Silk Chiffon 
Length: 135 cm 

What sizes do the kaftans come in? 

The kaftans Comes in a Small and Medium. A small will fit a size 8-12 and the Medium a 12-16.

How do I wash my kaftan? 

We advise to only hand wash the kaftan as the fabric is very delicate. Do not ring out the water, however place the kaftan in a towel and pat out the excess water. When ironing, only use a cold to warm heat.

name: 'You and floss candy' Kaftan
description:
'You and Floss candy' is an above the knee kaftan that features an original bold, print. 'Floss candy' is made from a soft fabric that is slightly sheer and becomes more fitted with the draw string waistband. This gorgeous kaftans have been designed with versatility in mind from luxurious beachwear to trend-setting causal/evening wear. Make an original statement in 'Floss candy'.

Every 'Ginger and You' kaftan has been created with individual signature prints you won't find anywhere else! 

Composition: 100% Silk Chiffon 
Length: 135 cm 

What sizes do the kaftans come in? 

The kaftans are made one size fits all so anyone that is a size 8 to 14 will achieve a free flowing look.

How do I wash my kaftan? 

We advise to only hand wash the kaftan as the fabric is very delicate. Do not ring out the water, however place the kaftan in a towel and pat out the excess water. When ironing, only use a cold to warm heat.

name: 'You and Flo' Kaftan
description:
'You and flo' is an above the knee length kaftan with a vibrant flower inspired print. 'Flo' is made from a delicate, soft fabric that is sheer and flowing and can be worn with or without a belt.

Size: One size fits all (see Info page)
Composition: 100% Silk Chiffon
Lengths: 85 cm & 90cm- because the kaftans are handmade, these measurements are only approximate

Model: Erica Jade
Photographer: Nitasa Samountry
